aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The focus of the data model is on standardizing the exchange of warranty information within the Catena-X network. This issue primarily affects suppliers who do not receive quality data from their customers (OEMs) and do not exchange data with their own suppliers (Tier 2 - n). These suppliers receive warranty claims from their customers (OEMs) at regular or irregular intervals. Due to a lack of “real” quality data, these claims are used to derive a quality analysis of the faulty components.

The focus of the data model is on standardizing the exchange of warranty information within the Catena-X network. This issue primarily affects suppliers who do not receive quality data from their customers (OEMs) and do not exchange data with their own suppliers (Tier 2 - n). These suppliers receive warranty claims from their customers (OEMs) at regular or irregular intervals. Due to a lack of “real” quality data, these claims are used to derive a quality analysis of the faulty components.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The focus of the data model is on standardizing the exchange of warranty information within the Catena-X network. This issue primarily affects suppliers who do not receive quality data from their customers (OEMs) and do not exchange data with their own suppliers (Tier 2 - n). These suppliers receive warranty claims from their customers (OEMs) at regular or irregular intervals. Due to a lack of “real” quality data, these claims are used to derive a quality analysis of the faulty components.
Each claim from this data provider has a unique claim ID. If you combine the BPNL of the data provider with this claim ID you get a unique claim ID in the data space.
A unique identifier for one billing. It is data provider individual.
References the date when the claim was billed. Date format: ISO (JJJJ-MM-DD)
A unique identifier for one type of activity. It is data provider individual.
A unique identifier for one type of recovery. It is data provider individual.
A unique identifier for one type of warranty. It is data provider individual.
A unique code for one specific part family (technically similar to Product Groups).
A name for one specific part family (technically similar to Product Groups).
Billing currency according to ISO 4217 (latest version)
Billing amount for the specific repair.
Technical Factor which is charged
Cost for the repair - overall
Cost for the repair - parts
Labor costs for the repair
Cost for the repair - others (consumables, handling fees, etc.)
Individual hourly rate per OEM / per country
Code for OEM specific definition of the repair performed / billed
Description for OEM specific definition of the repair performed / billed
Labor time (minutes) - base labor
Labor time (minutes) - other
Labor time (minutes) - supplemental
Labor time (minutes) - diagnostic
Labor time (minutes) - total
A unique quality task identifier within this data-space.
A unique identifier for this vehicle in data-space. This property is optional as of now not all vehicles have this identifier assigned.
Vehicle manufacturer-specific anonymized VIN, which is still a unique identifier within this data provider.
Property based on a BPNS.
